sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category_level display_value="Mid Level">3a320462db9d23008e9357935e961911</category_level> <category_name>Warehouseman</category_name> <education_level display_value="High school Diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED)">9972c462db9d23008e9357935e9619b1</education_level> <minimum_experience>Must have 2-4 years warehouse experience with a minimum one year of DoD warehouse operations experience. Must be licensed to operate MHE (forklifts, tractors, etc.), operate bulk and small parts conveyer systems used in warehousing operations, and have a current 6k forklift license. Under general supervision, perform inspection on storage facility, supervise MHE preventive maintenance program and MHE usage, prepare warehouse planograph, compute warehouse net storage space area, monitor the warehouse space control system, analyze and determine MHE requirements, and maintain secure storage of hardware and software. Maintain computer based warehouse applications and mainframe locator systems. Maintain records of sub custody principal end items, conduct inventories, monitor shelf life items, input data entry transactions, and retrieval of historical records. Maintain hand held optical character recognition scanners, devices, and multimedia retrieval systems. Supervise the following procedures: location survey, location addition, location consolidation, embarkation, warehouse security, and care in storage. Supervise the following operations: stage material, inventory, receiving, shipping, warehouse safety program, and storage. Review and update materials and equipment delivery and receipt processes and prepare supply discrepancy report (SDR).</minimum_experience> <number>LABCAT0001150</number> <parent_category/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 16:40:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b3c4c426db9d23008e9357935e96190b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:54:59</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories> </record_update>
